pk.Tools
Class AbstractHandler

java.lang.Object
  


Direct Known Subclasses: 
BDHandler, EraserHandler, FractalHandler, FWCHandler, MystifyHandler, OvalHandler, PencilHandler, PolygonHandler, SelectionHandler, SquareHandler, TurtleHandler








public abstract class AbstractHandler
extends Object

AbstractHandler handles the drawing of different tools.All Tool Handler must extend this class.

Version:
0.1.
